name: Pool 8 offline trainer
description:
Pool 8 offline trainer is one of the top realistic 8 ball pool games. This is a unique 8 ball pool offline game that lets you master all 8 Ball Pool techniques and skills.

Play 1-ON-1 mode and take the 2 turns yourself, learn to react to each move you make. Choose and experiment any CUE you want to sense the real CUE value in terms of (Force, Time and Aim). Select and use any cue you want for free and at any level. Choose the Table/Mode that you like and that suits your taste (Free Mode, Call Pocket on each strike or Call Pocket on 8 Ball only). You can always customize your cue and table!

Refine your skills in this practice arena, before you play again top Pool players and enter the tournaments to win trophies! The carefully designed game is simple to learn, addictive to play, and incredible to look at. If you're a billiards fan, there is something for you to play and enjoy! Play Pool 8 offline trainer if you just want to relax and play without any game rules.

Key features:

- Touch control for moving the stick

- Compete 1-VS-1 match face-to-face and double fun!

- Advanced 3D physics engine

- Authentic 8 Ball pool table game experience

- Refine your skills to become a pro!

- Classy, exclusive, and legendary cues!

- Customize your cues and table!

How to Play! 

Touch the screen to adjust the direction. 

Drag down the power bar to strike.

Touch and hold at any point to move the cue-ball and tap to confirm for Free-ball.

Show off skills to dive into the 8 pool ball game, it's all about handling your cue with skill. So what you waiting for? Download now for FREE.  This classic game offers you the unique opportunity to chill and show off your skills on the table.
